title: Phone freezes a few seconds after swiping back from a search
content:
Pixel 2 XL with Android 10
Since March update here's what happens:
- from the home screen I type a search
- I get the search results
- I click on an item
- then I swipe back to the search results
- the search result is shown back but...
  ... the too search bar is empty
  ... the phone is unresponsive
  ... for a few seconds
  ... then all goes back to normal

This happens at random.
Yes: rebooted phone, cleared cache.
